EmailTemplate.textOnly: Welcome to Pivotal You are receiving this email as you have interacted with us in some way either digitally or attending one of our events. If you would like to continue to view information like the whitepaper below or to be invited to events we hold, please click yes now. PaaS: Open for Business Whitepaper Gartner says that for CEOs, "Growth is the top priority, by far. In 2014, it almost equals the sum of the next three top issues". Companies effectively using software development to achieve competitive advantage are more profitable than their peers. Organisations such as Square, Uber, Netflix, Airbnb, the Climate Corporate and Etsy are using software to change industries and disrupt business models. Put another way, software is eating the world. Companies looking to drive innovation through software development have new options and opportunities. You can find out more about us on our website here: www.pivotal.io Our blog is regularly updated and you might like to subscribe: http://blog.pivotal.io/ To make sure we tailor the information to your interest, please edit your preferences here: http://connect.pivotal.io/CommercialSubscription.html
